welcome_message_body: Welcome to Maina, Guam! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its stunning beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Maina has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Andersen AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Andersen AFB Airport is used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guam International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guam International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
